alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Robeson County through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raemon, or 11 miles southeast of Laurinburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, Rowland, Rex, Raemon, Shannon, Buie, Wakulla, Purvis, Prospect, Elrod, Parkton, Rennert, Lumber Bridge and Raynham. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 2 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
